verse: This is what the Lord of Armies, the God of Israel, says.
Judgment has come upon the tableland, on Holon, on Jahzah, on Mephaâ€™ath,
on Dibon, on Nebo, on Beth Diblathaim,
on Kiriathaim, on Beth Gamul, on Beth Meon,
on Kerioth, on Bozrah, and on all the towns of the land of Moab, far and near.
